# Support unity build with uber files
set(NoUberFile ${SourceGroup_CryFX_Deferred} ${SourceGroup_CryFX_Effects_Atmospheric} ${SourceGroup_CryFX_Effects_Game} ${SourceGroup_CryFX_Effects_Optic} ${SourceGroup_CryFX_Effects_Water} ${SourceGroup_CryFX_Extensions} ${SourceGroup_CryFX_ForwardShading} ${SourceGroup_CryFX_ForwardShading_Deprecated} ${SourceGroup_CryFX_ForwardShading_Include} ${SourceGroup_CryFX_ForwardShading_Layers} ${SourceGroup_CryFX_ForwardShading_Validations} ${SourceGroup_CryFX_Include} ${SourceGroup_CryFX_Include_CommonPasses} ${SourceGroup_CryFX_Misc} ${SourceGroup_CryFX_Particles} ${SourceGroup_CryFX_Particles_Include} ${SourceGroup_CryFX_PostProcess} ${SourceGroup_CryFX_PostProcess_Include} ${SourceGroup_CryFX_SVO} ${SourceGroup_CryFX_Shadows} ${SourceGroup_CryFX_Shadows_Include} ${SourceGroup_Root}  )


set (SOURCES
	${NoUberFile}
)
#END-FILE-LIST



add_custom_target( ${THIS_PROJECT} SOURCES ${SOURCES} )
